Fresh ChivesFresh Chives. INTRODUCTION: Chives are a well-known member of the onion family. Chives are the meekest of the all the onions. This herb is native to Britain, Northern Europe and North America. They are the easiest to grow of the fresh herbs used for culinary purposes. Chives are found in many English, French and German gardens.
